SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 0;
DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS `testdb`;
CREATE DATABASE `testdb`;
USE `testdb`;

-- ----------------------------
-- åˆ›å»º user è¡¨
-- ----------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `user`;
CREATE TABLE `user`  (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `password` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `createtime` datetime NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 6 CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_bin ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

    # 1.å¾ªç¯å•æ¬¡æ’å…¥

    æ¥ä¸‹æ¥æˆ‘ä»¬å°†ä½¿ç”¨ Spring Boot é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œæ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥ 10W æ¡æ•°æ®æ¥åˆ†åˆ«æµ‹è¯•å„ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•çš„æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´ã€‚

    import com.example.demo.model.User;
import com.example.demo.service.impl.UserServiceImpl;
import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.boot.test.context.SpringBootTest;

@SpringBootTest
class UserControllerTest {

    // æœ€å¤§å¾ªç¯æ¬¡æ•°
    private static final int MAXCOUNT = 100000;

    @Autowired
    private UserServiceImpl userService;

    /**

     * å¾ªç¯å•æ¬¡æ’å…¥

     */
    @Test
    void save() {
        long stime = System.currentTimeMillis(); // ç»Ÿè®¡å¼€å§‹æ—¶é—´
        for (int i = 0; i < MAXCOUNT; i++) {
            User user = new User();
            user.setName("test:" + i);
            user.setPassword("123456");
            userService.save(user);
        }
        long etime = System.currentTimeMillis(); // ç»Ÿè®¡ç»“æŸæ—¶é—´
        System.out.println("æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´ï¼š" + (etime - stime));
    }
}

    # 2.MP æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥

    MP æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥åŠŸèƒ½æ ¸å¿ƒå®ç°ç±»æœ‰ä¸‰ä¸ªï¼šUserControllerï¼ˆæ§åˆ¶å™¨ï¼‰ã€UserServiceImplï¼ˆä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘å®ç°ç±»ï¼‰ã€UserMapperï¼ˆæ•°æ®åº“æ˜ å°„ç±»ï¼‰ï¼Œå®ƒä»¬çš„è°ƒç”¨æµç¨‹å¦‚ä¸‹:

    æ³¨æ„æ­¤æ–¹æ³•å®ç°éœ€è¦å…ˆæ·»åŠ  MP æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œæ‰“å¼€ pom.xml æ–‡ä»¶æ·»åŠ å¦‚ä¸‹å†…å®¹ï¼š

    <groupId>com.baomidou</groupId>
    <artifactId>mybatis-plus-boot-starter</artifactId>

</dependency>

    æ³¨æ„ï¼šmybatis-plus-latest-version è¡¨ç¤º MP æ¡†æ¶çš„æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬å·ï¼Œå¯è®¿é—® https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/com.baomidou/mybatis-plus-boot-starter æŸ¥è¯¢æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬å·ï¼Œä½†åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ—¶å€™è®°å¾—ä¸€å®šè¦å°†ä¸Šé¢çš„ â€œmybatis-plus-latest-versionâ€æ›¿æ¢æˆæ¢æˆå…·ä½“çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬å·ï¼Œå¦‚ 3.4.3 æ‰èƒ½æ­£å¸¸çš„å¼•å…¥æ¡†æ¶ã€‚

    æ›´å¤š MP æ¡†æ¶çš„ä»‹ç»è¯·ç§»æ­¥å®ƒçš„å®˜ç½‘ï¼šhttps://baomidou.com/guide/

    # â‘  æ§åˆ¶å™¨å®ç°

    import com.example.demo.model.User;
import com.example.demo.service.impl.UserServiceImpl;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

@RestController
@RequestMapping("/u")
public class UserController {

    @Autowired
    private UserServiceImpl userService;

    /**

     * æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥ï¼ˆè‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼‰

     */
    @RequestMapping("/mysavebatch")
    public boolean mySaveBatch(){
        List<User> list = new ArrayList<>();
        // å¾…æ·»åŠ ï¼ˆç”¨æˆ·ï¼‰æ•°æ®
        for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++) {
            User user = new User();
            user.setName("test:"+i);
            user.setPassword("123456");
            list.add(user);
        }
        return userService.saveBatchCustom(list);
    }
}

    # â‘¡ ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘å±‚å®ç°

    import com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.service.impl.ServiceImpl;
import com.example.demo.mapper.UserMapper;
import com.example.demo.model.User;
import com.example.demo.service.UserService;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.util.List;

@Service
public class UserServiceImpl extends ServiceImpl<UserMapper,User>

        implements UserService {

    @Autowired
    private UserMapper userMapper;

    public boolean saveBatchCustom(List<User> list){
        return userMapper.saveBatchCustom(list);
    }
}

    # â‘¢ æ•°æ®æŒä¹…å±‚å®ç°

    import com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.BaseMapper;
import com.example.demo.model.User;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Mapper;

import java.util.List;

@Mapper
public interface UserMapper extends BaseMapper<User>{

    boolean saveBatchCustom(List<User> list);
}

    ç»è¿‡ä»¥ä¸Šä»£ç å®ç°ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ MP æ¥å®ç°æ•°æ®çš„æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥åŠŸèƒ½äº†ï¼Œä½†æœ¬ç¯‡é™¤äº†å…·ä½“çš„å®ç°ä»£ç ä¹‹å¤–ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¿˜è¦çŸ¥é“æ¯ç§æ–¹æ³•çš„æ‰§è¡Œæ•ˆç‡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ¥ä¸‹æ¥æˆ‘ä»¬æ¥ç¼–å†™ MP çš„æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç ã€‚

    import com.example.demo.model.User;
import com.example.demo.service.impl.UserServiceImpl;
import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.boot.test.context.SpringBootTest;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

@SpringBootTest
class UserControllerTest {

    // æœ€å¤§å¾ªç¯æ¬¡æ•°
    private static final int MAXCOUNT = 100000;

    @Autowired
    private UserServiceImpl userService;

    /**

     * MP æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥

     */
    @Test
    void saveBatch() {
        long stime = System.currentTimeMillis(); // ç»Ÿè®¡å¼€å§‹æ—¶é—´
        List<User> list = new ArrayList<>();
        for (int i = 0; i < MAXCOUNT; i++) {
            User user = new User();
            user.setName("test:" + i);
            user.setPassword("123456");
            list.add(user);
        }
        // MP æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥
        userService.saveBatch(list);
        long etime = System.currentTimeMillis(); // ç»Ÿè®¡ç»“æŸæ—¶é—´
        System.out.println("æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´ï¼š" + (etime - stime));
    }
}

    # MP æºç åˆ†æ

    ä» MP å’Œå¾ªç¯å•æ¬¡æ’å…¥çš„æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ MP å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯åƒæœ‰äº›æœ‹å‹è®¤ä¸ºçš„é‚£æ ·ï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯å¾ªç¯å•æ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œçš„ï¼Œä¸ºäº†æ›´æ¸…æ¥šçš„è¯´æ˜æ­¤é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æŸ¥çœ‹äº† MP çš„æºç ã€‚

    MP çš„æ ¸å¿ƒå®ç°ä»£ç æ˜¯ saveBatch æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ­¤æ–¹æ³•çš„æºç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

    ä»ä¸Šè¿°æºç å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼ŒMP æ˜¯å°†è¦æ‰§è¡Œçš„æ•°æ®åˆ†æˆ N ä»½ï¼Œæ¯ä»½ 1000 æ¡ï¼Œæ¯æ»¡ 1000 æ¡å°±ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å®ƒçš„æ€§èƒ½è¦æ¯”å¾ªç¯å•æ¬¡æ’å…¥çš„æ€§èƒ½é«˜å¾ˆå¤šã€‚

    # 3.åŸç”Ÿæ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥

    åŸç”Ÿæ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯ä¾é  MyBatis ä¸­çš„ foreach æ ‡ç­¾ï¼Œå°†æ•°æ®æ‹¼æ¥æˆä¸€æ¡åŸç”Ÿçš„ insert è¯­å¥ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§æ‰§è¡Œçš„ï¼Œæ ¸å¿ƒå®ç°ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ã€‚

    # â‘  ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘å±‚æ‰©å±•

    åœ¨ UserServiceImpl æ·»åŠ  saveBatchByNative æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå®ç°ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

    import com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.service.impl.ServiceImpl;
import com.example.demo.mapper.UserMapper;
import com.example.demo.model.User;
import com.example.demo.service.UserService;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;

import java.util.List;

@Service
public class UserServiceImpl extends ServiceImpl<UserMapper, User>

        implements UserService {

    @Autowired
    private UserMapper userMapper;

    public boolean saveBatchByNative(List<User> list) {
        return userMapper.saveBatchByNative(list);
    }

}

    # â‘¡ æ•°æ®æŒä¹…å±‚æ‰©å±•

    åœ¨ UserMapper æ·»åŠ  saveBatchByNative æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå®ç°ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

    import com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.BaseMapper;
import com.example.demo.model.User;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Mapper;

import java.util.List;

@Mapper
public interface UserMapper extends BaseMapper<User> {

    boolean saveBatchByNative(List<User> list);
}

    # â‘¢ æ·»åŠ  UserMapper.xml

    åˆ›å»º UserMapper.xml æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ foreach æ ‡ç­¾æ‹¼æ¥ SQLï¼Œå…·ä½“å®ç°ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd">
<mapper namespace="com.example.demo.mapper.UserMapper">
    <insert id="saveBatchByNative">
        INSERT INTO `USER`(`NAME`,`PASSWORD`) VALUES
        <foreach collection="list" separator="," item="item">
            (#{item.name},#{item.password})
        </foreach>
    </insert>

</mapper>

    ç»è¿‡ä»¥ä¸Šæ­¥éª¤ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åŸç”Ÿçš„æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥åŠŸèƒ½å°±å®ç°çš„å·®ä¸å¤šäº†ï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥æˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨å•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•æ¥æŸ¥çœ‹ä¸€ä¸‹æ­¤æ–¹æ³•çš„æ‰§è¡Œæ•ˆç‡ã€‚

    # åŸç”Ÿæ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥æ€§èƒ½æµ‹è¯•

    import com.example.demo.model.User;
import com.example.demo.service.impl.UserServiceImpl;
import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.boot.test.context.SpringBootTest;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

@SpringBootTest
class UserControllerTest {

    // æœ€å¤§å¾ªç¯æ¬¡æ•°
    private static final int MAXCOUNT = 100000;

    @Autowired
    private UserServiceImpl userService;
    
    /**

     * åŸç”Ÿè‡ªå·±æ‹¼æ¥ SQLï¼Œæ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥

     */
    @Test
    void saveBatchByNative() {
        long stime = System.currentTimeMillis(); // ç»Ÿè®¡å¼€å§‹æ—¶é—´
        List<User> list = new ArrayList<>();
        for (int i = 0; i < MAXCOUNT; i++) {
            User user = new User();
            user.setName("test:" + i);
            user.setPassword("123456");
            list.add(user);
        }
        // æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥
        userService.saveBatchByNative(list);
        long etime = System.currentTimeMillis(); // ç»Ÿè®¡ç»“æŸæ—¶é—´
        System.out.println("æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´ï¼š" + (etime - stime));
    }
}

    # ç¼ºç‚¹åˆ†æ

    ä»ä¸Šè¿°æŠ¥é”™ä¿¡æ¯å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œå½“æˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨åŸç”Ÿæ–¹æ³•å°† 10W æ¡æ•°æ®æ‹¼æ¥æˆä¸€ä¸ª SQL æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶ï¼Œç”±äºæ‹¼æ¥çš„ SQL è¿‡å¤§ï¼ˆ4.56Mï¼‰ä»è€Œå¯¼è‡´ç¨‹åºæ‰§è¡ŒæŠ¥é”™ï¼Œå› ä¸ºé»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ MySQL å¯ä»¥æ‰§è¡Œçš„æœ€å¤§ SQLï¼ˆå¤§å°ï¼‰ä¸º 4Mï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç¨‹åºå°±æŠ¥é”™äº†ã€‚

    è¿™å°±æ˜¯åŸç”Ÿæ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥æ–¹æ³•çš„ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆ MP éœ€è¦åˆ†æ‰¹æ‰§è¡Œçš„åŸå› ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†é˜²æ­¢ç¨‹åºåœ¨æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè§¦å‘äº†æ•°æ®åº“çš„æœ€å¤§æ‰§è¡Œ SQL è€Œå¯¼è‡´ç¨‹åºæ‰§è¡ŒæŠ¥é”™ã€‚

    # è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ

    å½“ç„¶æˆ‘ä»¬ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡è®¾ç½® MySQL çš„æœ€å¤§æ‰§è¡Œ SQL æ¥è§£å†³æŠ¥é”™çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œè®¾ç½®å‘½ä»¤å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

    -- è®¾ç½®æœ€å¤§æ‰§è¡Œ SQL ä¸º 10M
set global max_allowed_packet=10*1024*1024;

    å¦‚ä¸‹å›¾æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

    æ³¨æ„ï¼šä»¥ä¸Šå‘½ä»¤éœ€è¦åœ¨ MySQL è¿æ¥çš„å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ä¸­æ‰§è¡Œã€‚

    ä½†ä»¥ä¸Šè§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆä»æ˜¯æ²»æ ‡ä¸æ²»æœ¬ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæˆ‘ä»¬æ— æ³•é¢„æµ‹ç¨‹åºä¸­æœ€å¤§çš„æ‰§è¡Œ SQL åˆ°åº•æœ‰å¤šå¤§ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæœ€æ™®ä¸–çš„æ–¹æ³•å°±æ˜¯åˆ†é…æ‰§è¡Œæ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥çš„æ–¹æ³•äº†ï¼ˆä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯åƒ MP å®ç°çš„é‚£æ ·ï¼‰ã€‚
